DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , single-center study ass residency GSK2894512 skin healthy adult male volunteer normal barrier function . The study two part , Cohort 1 ( Part A ) follow Cohort 2 ( Part B ) . The study assess residence time human skin . The primary objective evaluate residency time skin follow topical application two formulation GSK2894512 Cream . The total study duration 15 day include 1 7 day treatment period , 8 14 day post treatment period 1 day follow . The screening period 28 day prior Baseline ( Day 1 ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Phase I Exploratory Study Healthy Volunteers With GSK2894512 Cream
